awd_titl_txt: IUTAM Symposium Entitled:  Eddy Structure Identification    in Free Turbulent Shear Flows (Poitiers, France) October 12-14, 1992
awd_abstract_narration: Partial support is provided to assist in travel expenses for                    American participants in an international symposium.  The                       symposium is:  "Eddy Structure Identification in Free                           Turbulent Shear Flows", to be held October 12-14, 1992 in                       Poitiers, France.  An additional limited number of                              participants, primarily younger researchers, will be able to                    participate in this conference devoted to a central issue in                    turbulence research:  the identification and tracking of                        organized, coherent structures in turbulent flows.                                                                                                              Advances in the ability to identify and characterize these                      structures is an essential element in developing better                         predictive methods for turbulent flows, which arise in a wide                   range of applications in engineering systems.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
